tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_updates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  update_message TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP,
  backer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (backer_id) REFERENCES backers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE backers (
    backer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backer_name VARCHAR(255),
    backer_email VARCHAR(255),
    backer_contribution DECIMAL(10, 2),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  sender_name VARCHAR(255),
  message_subject VARCHAR(255),
  message_body TEXT,
  communication_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE project_updates (
  update_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  update_date TIMESTAMP,
  update_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE backers (
  backer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  project_description TEXT,
  project_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(50),
    receiver VARCHAR(50),
    message_content TEXT,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE project_backers (
    project_id UUID,
    backer_id UUID,
    pledge_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_updates(update_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (backer_id) REFERENCES backers(backer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(50),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_updates(update_id)
);
